title: Anyone else love scaring the shit out of the enemy?
body:
I've recently discovered that I really enjoy scaring the enemy players so bad they panic flash or other funny things people do when they got vurry scurred.

right now my top 2 favorite "scare the enemy" moments are:

1. My lvl 3 flash ganks from FoW volibear into a flip mid lane
(vel'koz? meet bear in your face)
2. My speedy shen TPs when i have homeguard effects + stacked DMP + my MS quints so when I appear my MS is OVER 900. 
(thats right MF, you're kinda screwed)

seeing people flee in terror is much more enjoyable than it should be
